name: Bulletpowered Tower
description:
This game was made for the "Empty" Mini Jam

Controls

Arrow Keys: Move

X: Shoot

Z: Dash

Ascend the Bulletpowered Tower by unlocking the LOCKS scattered around the tower. The locks can be opened by finding KEYS that will appear when enough BULLETS are shot. But be careful as your own bullets can hurt you! 

I will update and or polish the game after the Jam.
